评论详情: The lightweight of the fabric itself is really marvelous to me ,, but still has a good amount of warmth . I have never liked how bulky Winter clothes make me feel . I guess you could say it’s almost like a sensory issue . But the material is tightly woven , warm , light on your body . Great roomy seat . Vibrant almost glossy navy color . BIG pockets , quality elastic encased waist band . OK … long story short if your even thinking about ordering this ; DO IT !!!! (5’5” / 215 - 220 / Bought Size XXL / Size Was Spot On)

Super soft and the most comfortable lounge set I’ve ever purchased, and I’ve purchased a lot!!! Long enough for my long legs, I’m 5’11”. I have bought this one in 3 colors!! Have received many compliments!

评论概述: Fit is very different than pictured.
评论详情: I bought this same outfit in black and wore it to death! I loved it. I thought I was buying the same thing in blue and the fit is completely different. It's super comfy and I'll keep it for pajamas, but not to wear out.
So comfortable!  Love these.  Will be getting some for Christmas presents.

These are super comfy, nice top and bottom! I bought xxl (just in case) the top form fitting comfy and the bottoms are little big around ankles but still overall happy and would buy again!!! Hard to find a set where top and bottom fit good!
I wish it were a little warmer.

I’ve been on the hunt for cute lounge sets for my work-from-home days, and this one is comfortable and has great potential for looking good on camera. However, I’m giving it a 4-star rating because, while it’s cozy, it still looks a bit too much like a traditional lounge set. It would be harder to dress up or style for other occasions.  The fabric is a nice weight—definitely not cheap—and it’s super stretchy and comfortable. I appreciate the great length, especially since I’ve had issues with sleeve and inseam lengths in other sets. For reference, I’m 5'9", 215lbs, and a 38 DDDD/G. My inseam for flats is 33/34 inches and 36 inches with heels. These fit perfectly, and the cuffed design works well.  This set washes nicely with no noticeable shrinkage, and I bought an XXL. Overall, it’s a solid purchase for lounging, but not as versatile for dressing up.
Love this! Best material And so cute

I normally cannot buy sets as I’m not the same size in pants as I am in tops but this set fit PERFECTLY! It’s not heavy and is soft. Wide elastic waist. The sleeves are just a tad long on me but I push up my sleeves anyway. The quality seems good. It did not shrink in dryer. I just ordered it in 2 more colors!!
Comfortable
I like them because  they are light enough to keep you warm but not overheat.
Na

I have been searching for a cute sweatsuit and was really hoping that this would be the one. Let’s just say it looked much better on the model.  The fit seemed frumpy and not flattering. The material was nice and soft and the color was just like the photo.
Very nice outfit. Looks great no matter were you wear it. I feel it runs a little big. I got a large and it’s a little big but still very comfortable. The material feels so soft.

I have purchased this set in three colors at this point. The material is so soft and comfortable, it feels like wearing pajamas but the material quality is nice enough that you look fashionable and cute out in public. It’s hard to find a set where both the top and bottom fit and this set hits the mark.

We bought three pairs for my mother and myself. Both of us are petite and an x-small size would be perfect. We ordered all small because x-small was not a choice. Even though we are both busty, these tops are not as fitted as they look in picture. Somewhat boxy and loose. The pants are long, which most are, but the cuff always helps in pants that are to long. The problem with the pants... the legs and hip areas are massive. For those of us with no butt, hips or tummy these appear  to be very baggy. Also, the material is much thinner than expected.  Many comments said these were warm. Maybe if you live in California or Florida. We have not worn them yet, so perhaps warmer than they feel. Beautiful color choices and the material is soft.

I purchased the Navy on sale. The color is as pictured. The style is very flattering. Im almost 5'7 and 150LBs and I got a M. My stomach is my problem area and I think it hides it well. The material is soft. Not too think or thick. Comfy enough to sleep or work out in. Even though I have no complaints, the 4 stars is for the value. Even on sale, it was overpriced. It's a good purchase but nothing blew me away.

I absolutely love this two-piece set! The fabric is incredibly soft and just the right thickness—not too heavy, but still cozy. It’s perfect for anyone who works from home and wants to be comfortable while still feeling put together for the day.  What I love most is its versatility—you can easily dress it up with accessories like a beanie, jacket, necklace, and cute tennis shoes for a stylish, casual look when running errands or meeting up with friends. I’m so impressed that I’ll definitely be purchasing this in multiple colors! Highly recommend!

评论概述: Nice but fit didn't work for me
评论详情: This is a very cute soft set, and I think it depends on your shape -  I wish you could buy separates.  I'm hourglass/curvy 5'6" and a US size 10, purchased a medium.  The top was roomy and the pants were very very fitted like tight joggers on me, , which I don't care for as I carry weight in my rear end and thighs.  I prefer my lounge wear the opposite, looser bottoms.  If I went up to large, the top would be huge.  So if you're about my size, but have slimmer legs, less butt and more chest a medium would probably fit you great.

I ordered one medium and one large (along with 4 other sets) from this seller because I wasn’t sure which would be the best fit. I found that the large was the correct fit and it is an amazing outfit. I love them all so I went to order six more in different colors (and return the medium). The price has increased from $27 to $41 ! Why wouldn’t they want to retain their customer base by allowing you to re-order or return for the same price as it was just two days ago when I made the original purchase.  I called Amazon and they weren’t willing to do anything and just said that the prices can change. I’m just shocked that I went to return the medium and there’s no option to get a replacement in a different size. You have to return it for a $27 credit and then re-purchase the correct size for $14 more, 41.00. In addition, the extra cost for 6 more sets would be 70 more dollars than 6 sets would have been two days ago.  It’s absolute price gouging!! They had me as a lifelong customer when I saw how great these outfits were. I’ll never buy from them again. It’s a shame because they have beautiful clothing, but I’m not supporting a business that price gauges their customers.  I leave for vacation in two days so I’m not able to wait for a reply from them regarding some type of customer satisfaction offer so it is what it is. Make sure you order what you want at the price you want because once they know they have you as a customer, they will double their pricing.  Amazons lack of empathy considering I spend thousands upon thousands of dollars with them every year is also frustrating. They surely could have offered me a credit or price adjustment to keep me happy, especially at Christmas. So disappointed, I was looking forward to having 10-15 new sets of loungewear.
If the product ran true to size I would’ve bought more colors but it runs big you’re small it’s more like a medium to large I washed it dried it and it’s still the same

I am 5’2” and the pants are extremely long. I have to roll up the waist so the crotch isn’t hanging down and then I lose the pockets (and the length is still long with the waist rolled). I bought the size Amazon recommended, but both the top and bottoms are loose. It’s fine around the house I guess. The cuff at the bottom of the pants isn’t like the photos. The cuff is more than half as long as they are on the model. The top fits well. The fabric is soft.  I know I’m short and that’s not why I gave 1 star. The one star is for the cuff and how the waist isn’t quite like pictured. I just wanted fellow short girls to know that these pants are looong! Great for the talls.
So frickin cute!  I recieve many compliments and questions on where I purchased this.  Good quality and length.  Probably buying aging in a different color

评论概述: The Colors Don’t Match the Description
评论详情: This is the second set that I bought because it is very comfortable. I initially purchased the khaki set, but the color was significantly different from the picture. I just received the second set in Brick Red, which is actually more of a fall orange, resembling the color of a pumpkin. I intend to keep it since I plan to wear it only at home.
This set is comfortable. You can wear it to run errands or wear it as pjs. It’s not very thick, so not super warm. The color is nice, more royal blue than navy. Got a size large and it fit well. TTS
Very "comfy" lounge set , unfortunately  ordered X-Large and it's swimming on me ! Will return for exchange !

I have bought several of these because they are very comfortable and I do like the style of the top and bottom and how they fit.  The big issue with them has been after a bit, they pill a lot and the waist band elastic is not sewn into the waist so it turns and twists.  If these two things were addressed, I'd love them.
I loved the comfort and color and lighter weight but after 2 gentle washes the top is starting to pill.

评论概述: Super comfortable, but has started to pill in the crotch area after wearing many times
评论详情: I have had this set for about 2 years now. I sized up and it was perfect. I got the dark blue and it was a really nice color - truly dark blue, but not royal blue and not navy - pretty much as pictured. The only issue I've had is that after having it for a while and washing it many times, it has started to ball up in the inner thigh/crotch area a little bit. So it's not the very best quality, but it's still wearable and very comfortable. I've liked it!
The materials were as described, and the product pictures and sizing were accurate.
Got this in the mail yesterday & looked so great straight out of the package that I wore it to my son's birthday dinner.  Was very soft & comfortable, great buy!
Came in a timely manner and a good fit.
Purchased the navy blue/stripe. I’m ordering more because I don’t want to take it off! It’s very comfortable and fits well. I’m 5’5 145 lbs. fits me perfect!
Super comfy and the pockets, drawstring and cuff make it so you don't feel like you've been in your jammies all day! 🤣Recommend!!
Color does not match description
Good quality
I love the fit and the feel of the fabric. The fit was expected .

This set is lightweight, cute and comfortable. It would be ideal for loungewear or travel. I ordered a medium and in my opinion, it runs a bit big so if you want a more snug fit, size down. For reference I'm 5'9 and a size 6-8.

Love this so much I ordered in another color. Only thing that should be noted is that the length is long. I am 5’9” and the pants are very long even for me who usually orders extra length. Threw it on with a vest & scarf for my kids games.
I loved the style.. Don't like weight.. Bought to wear out to hospital for testing..to cold in Northern Michigan
Fabric is nice. Color was great arms are too tight.

评论概述: Not quite the same green as pictured and XL waist band is tight
评论详情: I should have known better and ordered the XXL as the elastic waist band is kind of tight. I wear XL in everything else, so thought I would be ok. It's also light weight and I was cold in 30 degrees with a coat on.  The color is not quite the olive that is pictured either.

I wanted to write a review on the sizing to help others.  I don’t know about the quality yet since I’ve only had it a week.  I read reviews before purchasing and I’m glad I did.  I’m 5 feet 4 and weigh about 200 lbs and the size large fit great.  According to the size chart, my size would be a 2x, but that would have been too big.  The large fits great everywhere except the upper arms.  My arms are a bit tight on the shirt, but not uncomfortably nor does it look weird, and for reference my arms are 15 inches in circumference.  I wanted to mention that in case you don’t like that then you might want to order an XL.

I have a lot of doctor's appointments and MRIs coming up and scans so needed an outfit that I could wear right in to the appointment. I weigh 213 lb and I ordered the extra large and it's amazing. It's very lightweight but nothing clings to anything. It hangs nicely. I'm really shocked. I'm going to buy some others. Also. I've lost 70 lb and I have 30 more to go and I'm going to order one size smaller now for when I lose weight more weight. I'm really pleased with this purchase
Runs slightly big but ok Very nice and soft Not see thru

This set is so comfortable. I usually get way too warm, but this lightweight set is perfect. It is not see through, very comfortable, and can be dressed up or down. Long enough for my long arms&legs. Not too tight on the backside either.
very comfortable, love all Amazon has to offer, the delivery is great too
The material is so soft it’s super comfy, fits perfectly extra large fits like an extra large and just love the nice color dark gray it was just really comfortable to wear
Bought this set to wear on a very long flight. Very comfortable, even has pockets. Great purchase.

I just received my outfit and I was completely surprised one the quality of the product and how fast it was delivered.  This outfit is comfortable.  I love the fit and the outfit is so soft.  I am ordering two more lounge outfits as I can explain how happy I am with this.  Would recommend this outfit to anyone.

This looks perfect in the Amazon photo. It really life it’s just ok. The way one of the sleeves was put in made weird wrinkles across my chest. The top had no band on the bottom so to look decent it had to be tucked in, and I didn’t really like that. Was not expecting the fabric to be so thin; it’s more pajama weight than sweatsuit weight. The ankle elastic doesn’t fit just right and the pants legs kept creeping up my legs. If this “sweatsuit” doesn’t wash and dry nicely, I’ll be sending it back. A little disappointed as the overall quality could be better. There’s probably a better option out there, but I needed it right away and it arrived next day. I think I’d skip this one and find something else.

Only reason I gave this 4 stars is because the cuff on the pants not only did not match the photo but they were slightly different in length from each other. No one else would notice if you didn't call it out but it appears to be able 2-3" on the model photo but the one I received was just over 1.5". Otherwise, I love this! Both are a little baggy but just enough. For $20, (on sale and coupon) I really don't have any other complaints. I surely wouldnt pay the normal $41 for this but at $20, all good. Material was soft and unlike other reviews, I didn't find it transparent or too thin. It's still summertime and it's perfect loungewear. I'd wear more daytime, like a casual brunch or lunch spot with some sneakers, maybe yoga, or run errands in but I saw some reviews that people dressed it up and wore it "out" - not for me though. Ordered a small. 5'1", 129#
This set is super cute. Lightweight and fits true to size. I have had for about a year now and still like it. I didn't give it 5 stars because it is a bit nubby after washing so many times.

This is a very comfortable, soft fabric which drapes well and runs  true to size so order your size with confidence. However, it is not so much suited for cold weather months which I was searching for, I kept it not only because it looked so good on, as a great transitional outfit for Spring and Fall. However, it also may suit you for winter if you are warm blooded. It is about the weight and feel of a T-shirt. O love it!
Good value. Really cute fit would buy different colors.My daughter loved it

Great weekend set, very comfortable and soft material. The top fits kind of weird in the arms, but still comfortable. I’ve bought two. Held up well with washing and didn’t shrink. The length is great, it’s short like a lot of joggers. I bought a large, I could have done a medium but I like mine a bit baggy. I’m 5’6 181 pounds.
Wish I could choose a smaller top with XLARGE bottom. The neck is so big on XLARGE and I have a small chest.
Works well
Bought this track set for my daughter. Looks great for running errands or just hanging out. Extremely soft material and reasonably priced.
This brand always fits as expected and makes beautiful clothes. I order other brands and they don’t fit correctly and I return them. This is comfy and soft.
I wear it all the time

评论用户: Didn’t like the top. Ran very large
评论详情: Wish I had picked a different color. It was supposed to be kaki but it is dirty brown.

I had been thinking about buying these for a while and they went on sale so I grabbed a pair. I had read they ran a little large so I bought an XL.  I like to have my clothes a little bigger so I general buy an XXL. However, these fit great. I'm 5'8.and  I have long legs and they fit around my ankles. The shirt sleeve length is down to my wrists, and the color is a really lovely shade of blue. It is a thin fabric, but I live in a temperate climate in California and I will be able to wear this outfit during the Autumn and Spring months. Like wearing pajamas outside.
Love the top, fits great, the pants are bigger than sized. Good for around the house, order smaller size.
Wow! So comfortable. The material is so soft. Love the jogger fit & POCKETS. Quality seems good for the price. Cute color & stylish for at home or to run to the store. Warm & cozy!

评论概述: They fit great & love them Soft & comfy!
评论详情: Again the only problem is made in China!
One of my favorite comfy outfits for home

This little outfit was OK for the airport, but my usual Medium looked like a tent, had no shape, and looked too "slouchy" for my taste. Also, the material is Not 100% cotton, so I felt way too hot/sweaty but not in a cozy way. I wore it once, then into the "donate" bin.
Super cute, light weight, well made

Love this outfit and it is so comfy and fits beautifully.  True to size.  However, about 4 or 5 washes and it is showing wear "pilling".  I suggest when you wash it turn it inside out.  I should have done that.
Love the navy blue color, very soft and comfortable

I knew that there was a chance that this would look like pajamas and it did.  The description of the product is accurate, but the photo shows just enough of the top behind the coffee and the bag to look like a sweatshirt.  It is not - it is a long sleeve t shirt.  If that's okay, this is for you.

Runs slightly larger than normal.  I usually wear an XL top but ordered large as recomended.  Fits well and is very comfortable.  Fabric is lightweight and can easily be worn in early spring and fall.  I will also wear in winter because typical jogger fabric is to heavy and warm for me.  In freezing weather, thermal underwear under this set may be an option for extra warmth.
The outfit did not disappoint. It was exactly as illustrated.  After washing, it’s soft with no shrinkage.  I would order again.

Arrived quickly, fit is perfect, lays nice, pockets do not gap, and flattering. Lighter material than a "sweat" material so not bulky. I am sure if wore outside with cold winter wind it would blow thru...but perfect for staying inside or spring/fall weather. Washes nice. Definitely going to order other colors.
Great for travel
So comfy and cute!
Cozy, light weight, and true to size.
Very soft breathable material. Fit perfectly

评论概述: I like the color, but it wrinkles
评论详情: This outfit is different than the others by the same company. I own 3 others in a different style and thought I knew the product. I do like the color and the fabric feels nice against the skin. With that said, the sizing is not like the others, it feels pretty big on, especially the top. The fabric also has a higher content of “stretchy” material. What I don’t like is the fact that this fabric in this outfit comes out of the dryer wrinkled. I knew it was going to be an issue when the care label mentioned ironing it. The other style I have is more cottony and comes out of the dryet just fine, I am someone one who immediately empties the dryer when the buzzer goes off so it isn’t as if I left the load of clothes lay in there. Everything goes from the dryer to a hanger. I bought a second one of these in a different color but the same size so now I know what I’m in for.

There’s a little too big, but I was hoping if I washed and dried it, it would fit me better. It is still huge. I have washed it twice. Still big. There’s always a suggested size that Amazon suggest. It said to order a medium. A small would fit me just fine.

I love the way this looked when I got the outfit and wore it with pride.  The fit was perfect. The size was xl. However, I shouldn’t have put this in the dryer even on an appropriate setting.  The sleeves shrunk tremendously; but the body of the top did not shrink at all.  No one could wear without laughter the ridiculous top I now have.
Nice to wear around the house. Material too thin for me to wear outside the house.
I really like this lounge set.  It is light weight material and after washing multiple times, there is no shrinkage.
They are so soft and comfortable!  My daughter ordered a pair too.

I bring with me so I have something comfy to lounge in when I have unexpexted layovers at a hotel I wasn't planning on staying in. Light, loose, has pockets and hangs well on the body. Not constricting in any way. I like mine a bit bigger, I got a Large, I'm usually a Large but knew this will be bigger. So I'd say it runs a bit bigger than your usual size. I contemplated on getting another one size smaller just to have on hand.

After returning so many sets this one finally felt so right. Comfy. Not tight on belly . I’m 5’8” and 145 lb. Pants were long enough. It was very stylish . I was so excited that I ordered a second pair right away.

Loved the soft fabric. It was a good weight and fit well. I am 5’4” and 170 lbs. a large fit well. The length was just right. I probably could have ordered the medium, but I like the baggier fit for lounging

I am used to ordering larger sizes when I order from Amazon because clothes made in China usually run very small. I ordered an XXY. It was TOOOOO big. I loved the fabric. It was soft but not flimsy. Not heavy but a nice weight for fall, spring or those cool summer nights. If I still lived in Florida, I would perfect for Florida winters. I have to return it because it us too big. I am 5'4 and 190 lbs. The other problem for me was the color. It is an orange nutmeg. Pretty if you can wear it. I can't wear orangey color. I may change color and size.
Love this set so much I bought one in every color. Very comfortable. A bit see through though.
I love the soft material and color. Super comfy. Great for travel and being cute around the house.

评论概述: I’m not a fan of the fabric.
评论详情: I like the looks of this set but I thought that it would be more of like a sweat shirt/pants kind of material. It is not. It is a lighter weight material. I am slender and I ordered a size small. If it had been made of sweat pants material and top it would ok. But as it is, it just hangs on me. It seems to be well made.
The material is so soft! It fits great and the colors are so pretty. I've ordered 4 total! Great quality!

评论概述: One out of two isn't bad...
评论详情: I ordered two of these tracksuits.  I received the dark khaki on 27 July.  In that size I ordered a large and the Royal blue I ordered an extra large.  The large is a bit baggy but I like it like that.  The extra large finally came a week later, and in the wrong color.  If the large is baggy on me, I imagine in extra large, I would be swimming in.  Sending that one back but certainly keeping my dark khaki.  It's a little long but it's perfect for running errands and lounging around my house.
I bought this because I travel a lot! Good material! The arms are kind of tight but everything else is good! I bought two the green and the gray!

评论概述: very cute- but sizing not for me
评论详情: I first ordered this very cute outfit in an XL because that is usually the size I wear on top. Both Top & pants were way too big & returned.  I intended to wear the comfy set on a long international flightI. I ordered a second set in Red size LG which Is beautiful but the top is also too large. Its a nice set, comfy fabric,  and a super value but Sadly I also had to return the red set in LG. :-(

I bought 3 sets as a gift with the assumption that they were sweatshirt material (Since this is what the description states).  They are, in fact, a thin t-shirt like fabric.  Not for warmth at all.  Colors were very pretty though.
It is not warm enough to wear in cold weather.  More of a Fall or Spring.
Fits great, lightweight, cute

I like the lounge wear outfit because it was soft and comfortable. I am only 5’ and the medium size was recommended.  The pants came way up on me and the top swallowed me. Could have fit another person in the top. Returning the medium but thinking about trying a size small
